entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Clyde River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Clyde River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:20 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -37.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clyde River Airport 6:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

Temperature: -37.5°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -41.7°C

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Blizzard. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the morning. Blizzard developing near noon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 then to 70 gusting to 90 early in the afternoon. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 53 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending overnight then cloudy. Blowing snow overnight. Wind northwest 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 50 gusting to 70 after midnight then becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill minus 50 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
